page.title: 19SECTION ll + SECTION l2
page.content:
AMENITIES - 0l = l2. 02 = l4. 03 = l9.
SECTION l2 - BARTON FELL FARMING - Open, rough uncultivated land where local farmers have grazing rights. Unlimited grazing leads to serious over-grazing, especially with sheep. Cattle are also grazed but on a limited scale as the are is partly covered with bracken which is poisonous to cattle for several months of the year LAND COVER - 0l = l former farm house made into 6 holiday flats. l9 = 2 streams, Aik Beck and Elder Beck which flow into Ullswater. AMENITIES - 0l = l6.
